name: ShoppingMate App
description: Go shopping with your mate! A lightweight shopping list app, which can be used to split the list: Several people can select categories and tick off items at the same time. This way you can share the load and be done faster.

name: My Portfolio
description: The page you are looking at right now: A portfolio showcasing some of my projects, my skillset, and of course a CTA to contact me.
